alert.note: Alert for Lee (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 5:10PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lee and central Tunica Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 510 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Brickeys, or 10 miles east of Marianna, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tunica, North Tunica, Robinsonville, Little Texas, Raggio, Haleside, Fox Island, Commerce, Austin, Peters, Clayton, Phillips Bayou, Hollywood, Lost Lake, Diamond Woods, Banks, Whitehall, Evansville and Bowdre. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
